... waiting for you to find more Game keywords [/]
Embark on the road of Redemption: find your original life in this hell world
See the kingdom of terror: ready, well prepared, brave and fast all the way, in-depth exploration of various fields.
Face the strong enemy: resist the deadly attack from the threatening zombie and survive successfully.
Choose the way to survive: sneak, run and hide, or use limited ammunition to fight the zombies.
Extreme terror, suspense and tension: take you into the thrilling world of uneasiness and trembling. The background music makes you immerse yourself. prompt [/]
This game is made by a junior high school student. I hope you will like it. If there are any shortcomings, please inform me of the feedback QQ group 464079894
The game material comes from the unreal mall. The game is made with UE4. Thank you for your support
